title: The perceptron: Code it in python 3.3
description: When it comes to artificial intelligence it's almost impossible to not talk about the perceptron. Let's build a perceptron from scratch just using Numpy in Python.
keywords: perceptron in python, perceptron how it works, multilayer perceptron, mlp machine learning, mlp deep learning, perceptron from scratch
meta_description: Learn how to code a multilayer perceptron from scratch in python for deep learning
